credit:
Dir: Rian Johnson

outline: Walt goes on the run. Jesse is taken hostage. Skyler believes it's time to tell Flynn the truth.
title: Breaking Bad

credit:
Dir: Vince Gilligan
    With: Bryan Cranston, Anna Gunn, Aaron Paul
outline: Walter White makes one last attempt to secure his family's future, while also visiting some old enemies, during his final return to Albuquerque.
title: Breaking Bad

credit:
Dir: Chris Fisher

outline: Samaritan launches a cyber-attack on the stock exchange, leaving the team with no choice but to embark on a possible suicide mission in a desperate attempt to stop a global economic catastrophe.
title: Person of Interest

credit:
Dir: Vince Gilligan
    With: Bryan Cranston, Anna Gunn, Aaron Paul
outline: Jesse is brought to the FBI for questioning on his knowledge of Ricin. In a last effort to kill Gus, Walt must ask for help from an old enemy.

outline: Jack devises a plan to apprehend Hannibal, while Hannibal prepares for his departure. Will makes his decision, and it results in devastating consequences.

outline: Robb and Catelyn arrive at the Twins for the wedding. Jon is put to the test to see where his loyalties truly lie. Bran's group decides to split up. Daenerys plans an invasion of Yunkai.

Dir: Greg Nicotero

Dir: Michael Rymer

episode: Episode: The Wrath of the Lamb (2015)
outline: Will hatches a cunning plot to slay Francis Dolarhyde, using Hannibal Lecter in his ploy. Bedelia voices concern about the perilous plan as Will continues his game with Hannibal, though Will may have to face his darkest fears.

Dir: Neil Druckmann, Bruce Straley

credit:
Dir: Michelle MacLaren

outline: Jesse and Hank come up with an idea to take Walt down. Walt hires Todd's uncle to kill Jesse.
title: Breaking Bad

credit:
Dir: Steve Shill

title: Dexter

Dir: Rick Jacobson

outline: Mark Mardon, having survived his apparent death during the black-matter explosion, returns seeking revenge on Joe for the death of his brother Clyde and has the same weather-manipulation powers as his deceased sibling.

Dir: Miguel Sapochnik
    With: Peter Dinklage, Lena Headey, Emilia Clarke
outline: Tyrion advises Daenerys. Sansa forces Theon to tell her a secret. Cersei remains stubborn. Arya meets her first target. Jon and Tormund meet with the Wildling Elders.
title: Game of Thrones

credit:
Dir: David Slade
    With: Hugh Dancy, Mads Mikkelsen, Caroline Dhavernas
outline: Jack devises a plan to apprehend Hannibal, while Hannibal prepares for his departure. Will makes his decision, and it results in devastating consequences.
title: Hannibal

credit:
Dir: David Nutter
    With: Emilia Clarke, Kit Harington, Richard Madden
outline: Robb and Catelyn arrive at the Twins for the wedding. Jon is put to the test to see where his loyalties truly lie. Bran's group decides to split up. Daenerys plans an invasion of Yunkai.
title: Game of Thrones

credit:
Dir: Greg Nicotero
    With: Andrew Lincoln, Norman Reedus, Steven Yeun
outline: Daryl, Abraham and Sasha face-off against the Saviors. In Alexandria, Rick and his group make their way through the herd.
title: The Walking Dead

credit:
Dir: Michael Rymer
    With: Mads Mikkelsen, Hugh Dancy, Caroline Dhavernas
episode: Episode: The Wrath of the Lamb (2015)
outline: Will hatches a cunning plot to slay Francis Dolarhyde, using Hannibal Lecter in his ploy. Bedelia voices concern about the perilous plan as Will continues his game with Hannibal, though Will may have to face his darkest fears.
title: Hannibal

credit:
Dir: Neil Druckmann, Bruce Straley
    With: Troy Baker, Ashley Johnson, Hana Hayes
outline: 20 years after a pandemic destroyed the United States, Joel gets the task of taking Ellie into a nation-wide adventure to unveil a secret that can save humanity.
title: The Last of Us

credit:
Dir: Hettie Macdonald
    With: David Tennant, Freema Agyeman, Carey Mulligan
outline: Sally Sparrow receives a cryptic message from the Doctor about a mysterious new enemy species that is after the TARDIS.
title: Doctor Who

credit:
Dir: Michelle MacLaren
    With: Bryan Cranston, Anna Gunn, Aaron Paul
outline: Jesse and Hank come up with an idea to take Walt down. Walt hires Todd's uncle to kill Jesse.
title: Breaking Bad

credit:
Dir: Steve Shill
    With: Michael C. Hall, Julie Benz, Jennifer Carpenter
outline: Dexter is obsessed with getting the Trinity Killer himself, especially after Arthur has tracked him to Metro Homicide and learns his real identity...
title: Dexter

credit:
Dir: Rick Jacobson
    With: Liam McIntyre, Manu Bennett, Dustin Clare
outline: Spartacus and his outnumbered rebels make one last attempt to win freedom in an epic final battle against the Romans led by Marcus Crassus.
title: Spartacus: War of the Damned

credit:
Dir: Thor Freudenthal
    With: Grant Gustin, Candice Patton, Danielle Panabaker
outline: Mark Mardon, having survived his apparent death during the black-matter explosion, returns seeking revenge on Joe for the death of his brother Clyde and has the same weather-manipulation powers as his deceased sibling.
title: The Flash

credit:
Dir: Joss Whedon
    With: Sarah Michelle Gellar, Nicholas Brendon, Emma Caulfield
outline: Sunnydale is alive with the sound of music as a mysterious force causes everyone in town to burst into full musical numbers...
title: Buffy the Vampire Slayer

credit:
Dir: Rod Edge
    With: Shawn Fonteno, Ned Luke, Steven Ogg
genre: Action | Adventure | Comedy | Crime | Drama | Thriller
outline: Three very different criminals team-up for a series of daring, yet very profitable, heists in the corrupt city of Los Santos.

credit:
Dir: Thor Freudenthal
    With: Stephen Amell, Katie Cassidy, David Ramsey
genre: Action | Adventure | Crime | Drama | Mystery | Sci-Fi
outline: The League of Assassins give Oliver 48 hours to find Sara's killer, or Starling City citizens will die. Oliver then has an epic confrontation with Ra's al Ghul.
title: Arrow

credit:
Dir: Katie Jacobs
    With: Hugh Laurie, Robert Sean Leonard, Franka Potente
outline: House fights his doctors, the staff and his fellow patients when he's forced to stay in the psychiatric hospital under threat of permanently losing his medical license.
title: House M.D.

credit:
Dir: Jack Bender
    With: Naveen Andrews, Henry Ian Cusick, Emilie de Ravin

outline: Jack and the survivors wait for Charlie to turn off The Others' signal-jamming device, not knowing that he has been captured at the Looking Glass station. In addition, Sayid, Jin and Bernard are captured after The Others invade the camp.
title: Lost

credit:
Dir: Hideo Kojima
    With: David Hayter, Patric Zimmerman, Akio Ôtsuka
outline: A crack government anti-terrorist squad takes over an obscure Alaskan nuclear disposal facility with...
title: Metal Gear Solid

credit:
Dir: Alex Graves
    With: Peter Dinklage, Nikolaj Coster-Waldau, Lena Headey
episode: Episode: The Lion and the Rose (2014)
outline: Joffrey and Margaery's wedding has come. Tyrion breaks up with Shae. Ramsay tries to prove his worth to his father. Bran and company find a Weirwood tree.

credit:
Dir: Jack Bender
    With: Naveen Andrews, Henry Ian Cusick, Jeremy Davies
genre: Adventure | Drama | Fantasy | Mystery | Sci-Fi | Thriller
outline: During the helicopter ride to the ship, Desmond's consciousness begins jumping back and forth between present day 2004 and 1996. He is forced to find Daniel Faraday in 1996 in order to get answers and stop the jumps.

Dir: Shigeru Miyamoto

credit:
Dir: George Mastras
    With: Bryan Cranston, Anna Gunn, Aaron Paul
outline: The boys plan on robbing a train that has an entire car of methylamine.
title: Breaking Bad

credit:
Dir: Dermott Downs
    With: Grant Gustin, Candice Patton, Danielle Panabaker
outline: When the particle accelerator is back online, Barry will have to go back in time to stop Eobard Thawne on the night of his mother's murder 15 years ago.
title: The Flash

credit:
Dir: Scott Winant

credit:
Dir: Ernest R. Dickerson
    With: Andrew Lincoln, Norman Reedus, Steven Yeun
outline: Rick and the group face imminent danger as The Governor and his army arrive to take the prison.
title: The Walking Dead

credit:
Dir: Alex Graves
    With: Peter Dinklage, Nikolaj Coster-Waldau, Lena Headey
episode: Episode: The Mountain and the Viper (2014)
outline: Theon helps Ramsay seize Moat Cailin. The wildlings attack Mole's Town. Sansa comes up with a story to protect Lord Baelish. Daenerys finds out a secret about Ser Jorah. Oberyn Martell faces Ser Gregor Clegane.
title: Game of Thrones

credit:
Dir: Peter Gould
    With: Bryan Cranston, Anna Gunn, Aaron Paul
outline: Walt struggles as he adapts to aspects of his new identity. Jesse plans an escape against Jack and his crew.

credit:

title: Game of Thrones

credit:
Dir: Michael Slovis
    With: Bryan Cranston, Anna Gunn, Aaron Paul
outline: Walt makes his next move against Hank, putting Hank in a tough position. Hank confronts Jesse and attempts to turn him against Walt, and Jesse decides it's time to move on. Meanwhile, Todd has taken over the business.
title: Breaking Bad

credit:
Dir: Vince Gilligan
    With: Bryan Cranston, Anna Gunn, Aaron Paul
outline: Jesse has disappeared and Walt is in big trouble with Gus. So Gus rehires Gale to learn from Walt's cooking so that they can dispose of Walt once and for all.
title: Breaking Bad

credit:
Dir: Casey Hudson

credit:
Dir: Greg Nicotero
    With: Andrew Lincoln, Norman Reedus, Steven Yeun

credit:

    With: Bryan Cranston, Anna Gunn, Aaron Paul
outline: Walt expands his business overseas, and the money is pouring in.
title: Breaking Bad

credit:

    With: David Hayter, Josh Keaton, Peter Lurie
genre: Action | Adventure | Drama | Mystery | Romance | Sci-Fi | Thriller

credit:
Dir: Michelle MacLaren
    With: Bryan Cranston, Anna Gunn, Aaron Paul

credit:

credit:

    With: Nolan North, Emily Rose, Claudia Black

credit: Dir: Yoshinori Kitase, Yasushi Matsumura

credit:
